data.name: Instructions
data.value: Use this page to configure how Web site management data such as membership is stored. You can use a single provider for all the management data for your site or you can specify a different provider for each feature.

data.name: CurrentProvider
data.value: Your application is currently configured to use the provider: {0}

data.name: SelectDifferent
data.value: Select a different provider for each feature (advanced)

data.name: SelectSame
data.value: Select a single provider for all site management data
